item.title: Fly tipping on both sides of the road, 23rd August
item.description:
People are regularly dumping waste at the south side tree, and north side tree. It is very bad today - clearly construction, green waste and residential waste. There is a shipping label on one box. The address has been scrubbed but has post code and phone

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Sandringham Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Dry leafs are just getting more and more on Kelly Avenue., 23rd August
item.description:
Please remove whole bunch of dry leafs all over Kelly Avenue. Especially in front of 22 Kelly Avenue, because it's just getting more and more of dry leafs in front of 22 Kelly Avenue and around the area. Very strange approach from council cleaning services. The council cleaning service should use common sense.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 22, Kelly Avenue, Peckham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Illegal Subletting in flat 40, 23rd August
item.description:
Several different people with luggage going in and out of flat 40 every week. The noise coming from the flat can be unbearable. I do not feel safe with these unknown strangers going in and out of my home.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Arden Estate, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Roadworks traffic lights, 23rd August
item.description:
The roadworks traffic lights at the junction of Sewardstone road and kingshead hill is hidden and could only be seen by car passengers after going past the traffic lights. This is clearly dangerous as it is a busy four way junction.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lea Valley Road, Chingford, London
Report on FixMyStreet
